Description: Body sherd (mended from four fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with cul and handle roots; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; trace of added white bands; exterior: largely reserved; in handle zone, trace of vertical stroke between bands; glaze on handle roots; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1032) (phase 2)
